text: @brianschatz @chelseahandler ..and other liberal policies, having nothing to do with Covid19, that Dems can't get passed any other way. It's not politicizing the crisis by including other political maneuvering within a critical bill, right? Never let a good crisis go to waste, true politicians to the last.
